ETYMOLOGY: From Middle English 'trailen' (to drag along) + '-er' (agent noun suffix). Originally referring to one who trails; later applied to vehicles and films that 'trail' or follow.
SINCE: Late 15th century (as one who trails); mid-19th century (as a vehicle); early 20th century (as a film preview).

MEANINGS.POS_TIP: A word (other than a pronoun) used to identify any of a class of people, places, or things, or to name a particular one of these.
MEANINGS.DEF_EN: A vehicle or movable structure that is designed to be pulled by another vehicle, often used for transporting goods, animals, or as a temporary or mobile home.
MEANINGS.DEF_ZH: 一种由另一辆车牵引的车辆或可移动结构，常用于运输货物、动物或作为临时或移动住所。
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: We rented a small trailer to move our furniture to the new apartment.
MEANINGS.SENT_ZH: 我们租了一辆小拖车，把家具搬到新公寓。

MEANINGS.POS_TIP: A word (other than a pronoun) used to identify any of a class of people, places, or things, or to name a particular one of these.
MEANINGS.DEF_EN: A short promotional film or video composed of excerpts from a film, television program, video game, or similar product, shown in advance to advertise it.
MEANINGS.DEF_ZH: 由电影、电视节目、电子游戏或类似产品的片段组成的短篇宣传片或视频，提前播放以作宣传。
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: The trailer for the new action movie looks incredibly exciting.
MEANINGS.SENT_ZH: 这部新动作片的预告片看起来非常激动人心。

MEANINGS.POS_TIP: A word (other than a pronoun) used to identify any of a class of people, places, or things, or to name a particular one of these.
MEANINGS.DEF_EN: A person or animal that follows a trail or trails behind others; a tracker.
MEANINGS.DEF_ZH: 追踪者；尾随者。（指人或动物）
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: The experienced hunter was an excellent trailer, always able to follow the subtle signs in the wilderness.
MEANINGS.SENT_ZH: 这位经验丰富的猎人是一名出色的追踪者，总能在荒野中找到细微的踪迹。

MEANINGS.POS_TIP: A word (other than a pronoun) used to identify any of a class of people, places, or things, or to name a particular one of these.
MEANINGS.DEF_EN: A plant with long, creeping or hanging stems that 'trail' along the ground or over the sides of a container.
MEANINGS.DEF_ZH: 具有长而匍匐或下垂茎的植物，其茎沿着地面或容器边缘生长。
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: We chose a beautiful trailer plant for the hanging basket on the porch.
MEANINGS.SENT_ZH: 我们为门廊上的吊篮选择了一株美丽的垂挂植物。

REGISTER: Common in general usage for meanings related to vehicles and film previews; more specific or less common for other meanings.
